column1: Review

This is a well-built versatile mug! Different options of using it and it holds hot and cold beverages well!  With ice it stays cold even longer...
Read more

I like this because it has a larger volume and able to hold my Teh-C from a coffeeshop. It can really keep it hot for hours.
Read more

Good material and right size to handle.
Read more

love love love, bought it as a gift and the receiver loves it!

Led come off so easily leak every single time i try to use. Not keeping hot for even more than an hour
